attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty for the Woolwich machete Murders
attributes.additional_details: Today two men savagely attacked a possible Soldier for simply wearing a help for hero's shirt. This crime cannot go unpunished he was attacked in broad daylight. The attackers did not flee or apologies for the attack, simply saying sorry that women had to witness it and waited for armed police to arrive. For all those that protect our country from the scourge of Islamic extremism please sign this petition.
